titleStmt.title: The sick-mans couch A sermon preached before the most noble Prince Henrie at Greenewich, March 12. Ann. 1604. By Thomas Playfere professour of Diuinitie for the Ladie Margaret in Cambridge.
titleStmt.author: Playfere, Thomas, 1561?-1609.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Legat, printer to the Vniuersitie of Cambridge,
publicationStmt.date: 1605. And are to be sold in Paulschurchyard at the signe of the Crowne by Simon Waterson. [1605]

notesStmt.note: Errata on verso of H4, final leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
